text: "Calypso Crazy" is a single by British singer Billy Ocean. It is the second single from the singer's seventh studio album, Tear Down These Walls (1988). Following the successful chart performances of the Tear Down These Walls single "Get Outta My Dreams, Get Into My Car", "Calypso Crazy" was released as the album's second single. ==Track listing== * 12" Single (BOS T 2) #"Calypso Crazy (Extended Version)" #"Calypso Crazy (7" Version)" #"Calypso Crazy (Instrumental Version)" #"Let's Get Back Together" * 7" Single (BOS 2) #"Calypso Crazy" - 4:26 #"Let's Get Back Together" - 4:42 ==Chart performance== {| class="wikitable sortable" ! Chart (1988) ! title: Calypso Crazy
